sentences: Arutles mõtteis, kas minna või mitte.
context: In the context of Estonian, 'püüa' is the imperative form (command/request form) of the verb 'püüama', which means to try or attempt. It's used when telling someone to make an effort to do something, similar to 'try!' in English. The word appears in the sentence 'Püüa loogiliselt arutleda!' which translates to 'Try to reason logically!'
